data.eml:eml: Anaphothrips sineconus and Hyalopterothrips brunneus, two new species of Anaphothrips genus-group (Thysanoptera) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alavi, Jalil, Yazdanian, Mohsen, Minaei, Kambiz (2018): Anaphothrips sineconus and Hyalopterothrips brunneus, two new species of Anaphothrips genus-group (Thysanoptera) from Iran. Zootaxa 4388 (3): 437-443, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4388.3.10
